text: niyata vaśayenma allāhgē sannidhānayehi māsayangē gaṇanaya (ek vasarakaṭa) edāḷahaki. (mesēma) ahasda, bhūmiyada utpādanaya kaḷa dina siṭa allāh visin manakkalpita karanu læba ættēya. ēvāyen (māsa) hatarak pariśuddhaya. meyayi ṛju dharmaya. ebævin mēvāyehi (oba yuddha kara), obaṭama oba hāniyak kara nogata yutuya. ehet samānayan tabā namadina siyallanma (ema māsayanhidīda) oba samaga yuddha kaḷahot, esēma obat (ovunṭa viruddhava) siyallan samagama (ema māsayanhidīda) yuddha karanu. niyata vaśayenma allāh bhaya bhaktikayin samaga siṭinnēya yanna sthīra vaśayen dæna ganu
